title: How long have you played?
body:
Hello!
I just found this website which calculates your timed played, I've played for 702 hours, (29.2 days)
Now how long have you played exactly????

replies.body:
You are in DIAMOND V with estimated elo 2200. You have spent 1.3 hours earning each point of elo.	2,797 hours
116.6 days

I wonder if someone can beat my number on the boards =P
yeah...what can I say.. I love this game haha

Well, who doesn't????
Unless you don't play this game whatsoever...

But then again, I'm only Bronze 4

Hey man, 

It doesn't matter what rating you are lol. We are all one community and we all love this game!

In case you missed it 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/iR0ZA9wA-bronze-fails-episode-1
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CEL_70z3k14
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=um0LWaCjvGo
http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/21j8zp/how_to_make_calls_in_bronze/?

Bronze is the butt of all the crap that is given out in the community, it is shameful to be part of it in the eyes of the elite... This isn't a merry community that you have @RIOTHQ and I am shocked by your response. 

It's like kicking your dog, no one really cares who bags bronze players in fact they will probably agree with them. 

Even if I didn't care bronze is so toxic that the only reason I play is to get out of there, yet I am not good enough even if I do make some "fancy" plays.

Please, even if you do nothing about the community just understand it.

EDIT: I do wish you were right

Hey man,

I didn't mean for it to come across the wrong way. I understand what bronze is and the bronze jokes, I've been apart of this community for a long time as you can see by my hours played. What I meant by my statement is it doesn't really matter what rating you are, we are all one community and we all love the game. 

I didn't say no one ever makes fun of bronze players. I just personally think its fine whatever rating you are, everyone starts somewhere and it has nothing to do with how much you love a game. Bronze players love the game just like diamond players, unranked players love the game just like gold players.

What I meant was we are all League of Legends players, your love of the game isn't determined by how good you are at it. I'm sorry if I had conveyed that sentiment incorrectly in your eyes.

It's my fault, you were putting out a good message and I jumped on you for a misconception (ill put away my daggers). I realize you are talking about the game and not the community itself and I am sorry for putting you on the receiving end of that

This rant comes with a free deep house mix

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=waYpEQAYf3g
my elo is half the amount

2,276 hours
94.9 days

Close enough?
Close....but no cigar {{champion:104}}

I blame rito for the cigar.
(i'd add a "back in my days" speech, but back in my days Graves hadn't been released yet.)

You are in GOLD 1 with estimated elo 1780. 
2,781 hours
115.9 days

So close to you Maraudaur :P
Oh wow, nice!
I think I beat you in terms of hours played.....
lel
xD

797 on NA (33.2d)
3186 on OCE (132.7d)
**TOTAL 3983 (165.9d)**

And still bronze....

Sweet christ I need to get a life....

I got "You are in BRONZE III with estimated elo 940. You have spent 0.4 hours earning each point of elo. 423 hours
17.6 days" Hopefully I can get to s5 by the end of the season!

ur bronze 3???

:D SAME HERE :D
Maybe we can duo sometime :)

ALSO (btw) i checked your games... Don't call me a stalker, call me curious :P
ANYWAY, wat lane do u main???????????? Cause by the looks of it u main top lane :D
(I'm guessing from the Nasus game u had)

Hehe I actually main support because it's the least popular role, so I wanted to make sure I was at least good at that (Morg & Janna). Only problem is, it's the hardest position to "carry" and you rely on your ADC being good as well. 

So I started learning top (Nasus, Garen, Lissandra, GP) and mid (Ahri, Morg), trying to main mid. But again that's the most popular lane and it's so hard to get it, so I try and get top instead as it has at least better "carry" potential than support. 

I <3 Susan. 

I've been told to learn jg but I'm just terrible at it.

lelel
Just do wat (I think everyone should try to do) I do, main every role :P

Top: Nasus / Shen /cho'gath
Mid: Zed / Annie
JG: Master Yi / Kha'Zix / Shen
Adc: Ashe / Jinx / Quinn
Support: Thresh / Blitzcrank / Soraka

But that's me :P
:D :D :D
No wonder Riot doesn't know fuck all about their own game when some of their own staff are in BRONZE
